simplesect.para:
Because TortoiseSVN is being developed all the time it is sometimes hard to keep the documentation completely up to date. We maintain an interactive online FAQ at
Sourceforge.net
which contains a selection of the questions we are asked the most on the TortoiseSVN mailing list dev@tortoisesvn.tigris.org.

We also maintain a project Issue Tracker at
Berlios.de
which tells you about some of the things we have on our To-Do list, and bugs which have already been fixed. If you think you have found a bug, or want to request a new feature, check here first to see if someone else got there before you.
If you have a question which is not answered anywhere else, the best place to ask it is on the mailing list.
